pages.text: Homepage Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Slide 1 of 3 Slide 2 of 3 Slide 3 of 3 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides Menu Rooted in Craving. Centered in Comfort. At Katsubō, we don’t just serve food—we serve full-on flavor experiences. Our ramen starts with slow-simmered broths and craveable toppings that turn everyday ingredients into something next-level. And when it comes to drinks? We keep it just as bold. Our bar features Japanese-inspired cocktails, Japanese beers, sake, and wine selections that hit just right alongside crispy double-fried chicken. Everything we make is done with care, creativity, and the Katsubō hustle—great food, great vibes, no shortcuts. Menus Visit Us North Charleston, SC 29405 4628 Spruill Ave, Monday - Saturday from 11:00 am - 9:00 pmClosed Sunday Please contact us for reservations for parties of 6 to 10 hello@katsuboeats.com Order Now Email Signup Please, enter a valid first name First Name - Required Please, enter a valid last name Last Name - Required Please, enter a valid email Email - Required Submit Please check errors in the form above Thank you for signing up for email updates! Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Hours & Location 4628 Spruill Ave, North Charleston, SC 29405 Closed Sunday Monday - Saturday from 11:00 am - 9:00 pm Katsubō is a mostly walk-in experience. All are welcome, any time, no reservations needed. However, if you'd like to make a reservation for a party of 6-10, you can email us at hello@katsuboeats.com Parking There is free parking across the street along South Ave, and there are 2 free parking lots on the corner of Jenkins and Spruill Ave. Get Directions Order Now Email Signup Please, enter a valid first name First Name - Required Please, enter a valid last name Last Name - Required Please, enter a valid email Email - Required Submit Please check errors in the form above Thank you for signing up for email updates!
